That's not what he has communicated. It's not to say he needs to do it. But if there's any confusion of why a big chunk of the public doesn't feel that he's genuine, that's why. There isn't a sense of him connecting with his own behavior and own conscience at a level that most people can understand. So, while football fans and animal lovers continue to judge Michael Vick on very different scales, the dogs in Utah keep taking two steps forward and one step back.
